title: Juujun Na Omega Wa Yoru Ni Tsume Wo Tate
alternative_title: Jujun na Ω ha yoruni tsume wo tate ; 従順なΩは夜に爪を立て
status: Jujun na Ω ha yoruni tsume wo tate ; 従順なΩは夜に爪を立て
description:
Description :
        Umezaki Shion, an Omega, is the new manager of talented actor Alpha Matsuoka Yusei. However, this ostensibly innocent relationship is not as it seems. If fact, Shion has a mission. He needs to get closer to Matsuoka in order to take revenge, as he is the son of the actor who forced Shion's mother to retire from the entertainment industry. As Shion gradually gains the trust of Yusei, how will their relationship end...?
